comments.body: Not needed, since all I need from the bug is its string.

What about the following file extensions ?

lnk -> File Shortcut
bin -> Binary Executable
ps1 -> Windows PowerShell Cmdlet
sct -> Windows Scriptlet
vb , vbs -> VBScript File

If some of the above extensions should be added, I can send out a PR.

Thanks

i don't think some of these will integrate well with the plugin idea.
i'm +1 for ps1

> lnk -> File Shortcut

link files are mostly about GUI shortcuts

> bin -> Binary Executable

it's a binary file of a generic type. different tools have different interpretation of the contents.

> ps1 -> Windows PowerShell Cmdlet

this one is nice to have.

> sct -> Windows Scriptlet
> vb , vbs -> VBScript File

i think we can add these only if users demand them.

> i think we can add these only if users demand them.

I'd be in favor of having this be the criteria overall for adding any additional extensions

How about accumulating the count of unique paths in the loop and allocate array, newPaths, after the loop ?

This way there is no need to call append which saves some memory.
I don't think that matters that much here. You'd have to iterate over the paths array twice in that case.
